channel.title: Net-Stuff on bwoe
channel.description: Recent content in Net-Stuff on bwoe

item.title: I Blocked Almost Every Site for a Year - This is What Happened
item.description: So in my now-deleted posts The Internet is Hell and About My Blocklists, I explained a strategy that I was taking for the year: extreme isolation from the ebb and flow of the internet using Cold Turkey Blocker and a generous amount of browser extensions. I should also add that I installed browser extensions like uBlacklist to block search engine results, Shut Up to block comments, etc. Extreme measures, but measures that I thought would improve my mental health and distance me from the noise of the 2020s Information Age.
